cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.DB, cs.SY. 

The paper discusses the use of secret key sharing, private key encryption, and distributed storage to reduce the storage cost of blockchains, which falls under the category of cryptography (cs.CR). The paper also discusses the use of dynamic zone allocation to improve the integrity of transaction data, which falls under the category of distributed computing (cs.DC) and distributed systems (cs.DS). The paper also discusses the use of coding schemes to reduce storage costs, which falls under the category of databases (cs.DB). Finally, the paper discusses the reduction of energy costs in block validation, which falls under the category of systems and control (cs.SY).
